sources.title: A Nest of Gentry
sources.description:
Based on the novel of the same name by I.S. Turgenev. The hero of the picture is a nobleman, a wealthy landowner Lavretsky. Having parted with his unfaithful wife, he returns to Russia from Paris. At home, he meets a poor girl, Lisa, and they fall madly in love. But the mother wants to marry Liza to a rich official, and Lavretsky is not so easy to get a divorce from his wife.

Year of production: 1969

Director: Konchalovsky Andrey
Writers: Ezhov Valentin, Mikhalkov-Konchalovsky Andrey
Composer: Ovchinnikov Vyacheslav
Cinematographer: Rerberg Georgy
Production designers: Mikhail Romadin, Nikolay Dvigubsky, Alexander Boym

Cast: Terentyeva Nonna, Mikhalkov Nikita, Nikonenko Sergey, Merkuryev Vasily, Kulagin Leonid, Kupchenko Irina, Gubenko Nikolay, Sergachev Victor, Tyshkevich Beata, Chernova Tamara, Durasova Maria, Kostomolotsky Alexander, Dvigubsky Nikolay, Rupasova Zoya

metadata.Plot: Lavretsky returns to his estate after stay in Paris.Frustrated with life,in his wife's unfair, he falls in love with Lisa. Suddenly the arriving of FÃ«dors woman which before has been reported the death, completes the simple love.
metadata.Writer: Andrey Konchalovskiy, Ivan Turgenev, Valentin Yezhov
metadata.Actors: Irina Kupchenko, Leonid Kulagin, Beata Tyszkiewicz
